entry.title: Identify AzureAD PowerShell Users in your Tenant before Retirement

link.title: Identify AzureAD PowerShell Users in your Tenant before Retirement

entry.summary: Microsoft is retiring the legacy AzureAD and MSOnline PowerShell modules. These modules have been widely used for years to manage users, groups, roles, and other directory objects in Azure Active Directory (now Entra ID). With their deprecation, it’s critical to identify any users or automation that still rely on them — and plan a migration. In this post, I’ll walk you through how to: Iden...
